          Retail pos system

          EPOS’ data-driven retail POS system generates daily reports that lets you understand your business at a glance and provides vital features to maximise your store’s efficiency and grow your retail sales.

          F&B pos system

          Whether you run a Cafe, Restaurant, Bar or Quick-Service Restaurant, EPOS can improve your eatery by providing an all-in-one POS system that focuses on managing your customer’s orders and increasing the efficiency of your kitchen.

          Learn More

          minimart pos system

          Our minimart POS system uses smart automation to help ease the tedious process of inventory management while also giving you unparalleled visibility & control of the thousands of inventory you have stocked.

          HERE IS WHAT EPOS CAN DO FOR YOU

          Key features You Need To Run Your Business

          • CLOUD SYSTEM
          • INVENTORY MANAGEMENT
          • REAL TIME REPORT
          • ECOMMERCE INTEGRATION
          • LOCAL TECH SUPPORT

          POwerful Cloud System

          Simple to use and easy to learn, our POS machine allows you to sync your sales and inventory data from our POS hardware to a cloud database online.

          • Automatically sync and upload your sales data to the back-end system
          • Access your back-end system anytime through a web browser
          • The system works offline as well
          CONTACT US ALL FEATURES

          SMART Inventory Management

          Manage your inventory with ease using our POS software which gives you maximum visibility and control over your inventory.

          • Automatically re-order stocks
          • Create different variants and composites
          • Print out labels and barcodes with ease
          All Features Contact Us

          Accurate Real time reports

          Make better business decisions with real-time reports that are generated automatically using your sales data. 

          Increase your store’s profitability by gaining valuable insights from key metrics such as:

          • Sales data
          • Inventory levels
          • Profit margins
          • Sell-through rates
          All Features Contact Us

          Seamless ecommerce integration

          EPOS POS System partners with some of Singapore’s leading ecommerce platforms to seamlessly merge your online store to our POS system.

          Easily manage online orders on one POS terminal from platforms such as:

          • Shopify
          • WooCommerce
          • OpenCart
          All Features Contact Us

          LOCAL TECH SUPPORT

          Here at EPOS we believe in providing localised services with speed and efficiency. Our Singapore-based tech specialists are always ready to help, providing local and relevant troubleshooting advice to ensure that all POS-related issues are resolved quickly and smoothly. Our technicians are available from 9am to 11pm, everyday.

          WHY EPOS?

          • GOVERNMENT GRANTS
          • WHAT IS EPOS?

          Government Grants

          EPOS is a pre-approved vendor for various government grants that help local Singaporean companies adopt powerful and effective technological solutions at an affordable cost.

          Eligible SMEs can qualify for up to $10,000 in bonus payouts and 80% in grants.

          Government Grants We Support:
          – Productivity Solutions Grant (PSG)
          – Skills Future Enterprise Credit (SFEC)

          FIND OUT MORE

          WHAT IS EPOS?

          EPOS Singapore provides an integrated Point-Of-Sale System that manages your inventory, accounting, customers’ data and ecommerce platforms seamlessly.

          We are more than just a cash register. We provide a powerful yet cost-effective digital POS solution for local SMEs in retail, food and beverage, minimarts and more.

          In the past 12 years, our all-in-one POS device has served over 4,000 satisfied customers.
